name: Shoot (itch) (LucasHeh47)
description:
Update 1.1.0

New Features:

  • Larger Map
  • Redid some art
  • Lowered Shop prices
  • Bug fixes
  • Added portals that spawn 30 seconds into the game, then every 60 seconds if there isn't already a portal. Go through this portal to be teleported anywhere on the map

Controls
A - Left
D - right
Space - Jump
R - Reload
Left Click - Shoot
